ModMetaData.name: Rimsential - Spaceports
ModMetaData.author: SomewhereOutInSpace
ModMetaData.description: "For I dipped into the future, far as human eye could see, Saw the Vision of the world, and all the wonder that would be. Saw the heavens fill with commerce, argosies of magic sails, Pilots of the purple twilight dropping down with costly bales..." A mod for filling the heavens above your colony with commerce. Build landing pads and welcome a steady stream of shuttles carrying visitors, traders and guests. Be warned, however, for not everyone who picks up your signal will be friendly...
